For the basionym, Pennell referred to "Gratiola ruellioides Koenig ; Vahl, Enum. Plant. 1: 99. 1804." Vahl in turn referred to "Colsm. grat. 12.".  Therefore, Pennell's refernce to Vahl is treated as an an indirect reference to: G. ruellioides Colsm.
